title: Services

About this siteâ€™s Services

Home Assistant

In order to access a Custom React Dashboard from within Hoem assistant, add the following lines to home-assistant/config/configuration.yaml:
api:

http:
  cors_allowed_origins:
    - http://localhost:1234
Make sure above information matches your settings of the Custom React Dashboard. For that see the docker-compose.dev.yml file for the home-assistant-dashboard service.
